path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/QAP Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.QAPToken: Experiments/contracts/QAP Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit/QAPToken

findings.title: Design issue: _maxTxAmount and numTokensSellToAddToLiquidity values less than _tTotal(total supply)
findings.description: The _maxTxAmount and numTokensSellToAddToLiquidity values are less than _tTotal(total supply), which means there will be no adding liquidity and _maxTxAmount checking has no meaning.
